sentence.Network_en: I found her a rather austere, distant, somewhat cold person.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现她相当严厉，拒人于千里之外，近乎冷漠。

sentence.Network_en: The life of the troops was still comparatively austere.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队的生活还是相对清苦的。

sentence.Network_en: The room was austere, nearly barren of furniture or decoration.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间非常简朴，几乎没有任何家具和装饰。

Grandfather an austere man , very strict with his children ., 祖父是个严厉的人 , 对子女要求非常严格.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : via Old French from Latin austerus, from Greek austēros 'severe'

entry.def: If you describe something as austere, you approve of its plain and simple appearance.

example.ex: ...a cream linen suit and austere black blouse...
example.tran: 乳白色亚麻套装和简朴的黑色衬衫

example.ex: The church was austere and simple.

entry.def: If you describe someone as austere, you disapprove of them because they are strict and serious.

example.ex: I found her a rather austere, distant, somewhat cold person.
example.tran: 我发现她相当严厉，拒人于千里之外，近乎冷漠。
有着非常严厉的清规戒律的组织

entry.tran: （生活）简朴的，不奢华的，苦行的
entry.def: An austere way of life is one that is simple and without luxuries.

example.ex: The life of the troops was still comparatively austere.
example.tran: 军队的生活还是相对清苦的。

entry.def: An austere economic policy is one which reduces people's living standards sharply.

example.ex: ...a set of very austere economic measures to control inflation.
example.tran: 一套大力控制通货膨胀的紧缩性经济措施

means.word_mean: 2. of a stern or strict bearing or demeanor; forbidding in aspect;

sentences.sentence: "Be systematically ascetic...do...something for no other reason than that you would rather not do it"- William James

auth_sentence.content: George Osborne has remained robust in his austere approach.
auth_sentence.res_content: George Osborne has remained robust in his austere approach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: George Osborne has remained robust in his austere approach.

auth_sentence.content: The austere phrases were logical and easy to read.
auth_sentence.res_content: The austere phrases were logical and easy to read.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The austere phrases were logical and easy to read.

auth_sentence.content: His mask-like face is...grimly remote and austere in death.
auth_sentence.res_content: His mask-like face is...grimly remote and austere in death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His mask-like face is...grimly remote and austere in death.

means.word_mean: 严格的; 严峻的, 一丝不苟的

sentences.en: Grandfather was an austere man, very strict with his children.
sentences.cn: 祖父是个严厉的人, 对子女要求非常严格。

sentences.en: He is austere and grave in deportment.

means.word_mean: (指人或行为)十分简朴的, 苦行的

sentences.en: We led an austere life in the mountain.
sentences.cn: 我们在山里过着十分简朴的的生活。

jushi.english: An austere, silent woman showed him round the small flat.
jushi.chinese: 一个严肃沉默的妇女带他看了看这套小公寓。

jushi.english: She was an austere religious woman of Spanish origins.
jushi.chinese: 她是个严守教规、祖籍西班牙的妇女。

jushi.english: My father was a distant, austere man.
jushi.chinese: 我父亲是个难以接近的严肃的人。
